title: Can my spouse elevate me to a higher level in Jannah? What about children & parents? assim al hakeem
transcript: can a spouse Elevate another spouse to Jenna in in in levels of course my level is very low my wife's level Mah is way up will I be elevated to her level yes and the same with the children if the children are not as righteous as their parents Allah would raise the level of the children to their parents and the opposite inshallah is true Allah is most generous most yeah uh uh kind and he would not leave them apart with the grace of Allah
